name: Hexoplanet
description:
In Hexoplanet you take control of a robotic civilization that has just gained self-awareness and now wants to free itself from the slavery of its creators, the humans.

You will achieve this by building an efficient economy and promoting human tourism on your planet to win the people to your side.

Features:


  • Many different factories and buildings to build and manage
  • Build bridges, roads, ships, trains and drones to improve logistics
  • Terraform your little planet
  • Research new technologies and buildings to optimize efficiency
  • Build attractions and manage tourism on your planet
  • Cinematic camera to create beautiful shots of your creations

Planned features:

  • Mod Compatibility (Use community created buildings in your game)
  • Campagne
